title: The Thanksgiving Day from the Black Lagoon
description: Don't be a turkey. Come join the parade! November is here and Hubie's class in giving thanks for the things they enjoy football, turkey and vacation. They're even going to have a parade! But how can Hubie be thankful when none of his friends will make a float with him? And how can he eat all of that food for Thanksgiving dinner?
author: Mike Thaler
